text:
注意事項
請勿口服
請儲藏於乾爽陰暗處
避免接觸眼睛黏膜
如發生紅、搔癢等現象，請暫停使用。
含甜杏仁油成份，堅果過敏者請詢問專業人員。
快速出貨
平日3:00pm前訂購，當日出貨
付款方式
線上刷卡、刷卡分期、LINE Pay、貨到付款
配送方式
快遞宅配1-2天、超取2-3天送達

trans:
Notes
Do not ingest.
Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.
Avoid contact with eyes and mucous membranes.
Discontinue use if redness or itching occurs.
Contains sweet almond oil; consult a professional if you are allergic to nuts.
Fast Shipping
Orders placed before 3:00 PM on weekdays will be shipped the same day.
Payment Methods
Online credit card payment, credit card installment payment, LINE Pay, cash on delivery
Delivery Methods
Courier Home Delivery: 1–2 days; Convenience Store Pickup: 2–3 days
